title: riot plz
body:
please do something about this I be a few champs are unbalanced like bard amumu yummi â€¦
bard ill feel to have way to much damage for support item if he has the keystone electrocute 
amumu I feel he is so stupily broken that he can build full ap and be so tanky that he is almost unkillable 
yummi is so unkillable with the fact she can almost 1 shot a adc with her q and never be targetable and the fact her cd on her heal is so little late game she is almost psyhiscally unkillable 



sorry for spelling
